ygData.subject: FW: [shadowknight] a bunch of questions
ygData.msgSnippet: After 2 hours hunting in Befallen my con on the Ghouls at the Guild went from Warmly to indifferent. The next day it was back to Warmly. Don t know if they
ygData.messageBody:
After 2 hours hunting in Befallen my con on the Ghouls at the Guild went
from Warmly to indifferent. The next day it was back to Warmly. Don't know
if they have a short memory or it is a glitch

Sthiel
Cazic-Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: David [mailto:milamber@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 9:38 AM
To: Shadowknight
Subject: [shadowknight] a bunch of questions


From: "David" <milamber@...>

Since the list is dead.

I was watching the auctions last night on the newly edited Jewelry items and
saw someone selling a AC1 +5hp +5mana ring of some kind for 10pp. Does any
one know of any item(s) that would allow us to regenerate hp faster ... like
a troll, me not being one of course. I would assume that the +5hp is not a
regeneration just adds 5hp to someone which to me (and I would think a lot
of higher level players) is worthless along with the mana, and I already get
AC1 from my cutthroat rings without the 10pp cost.

Also, did anyone find out about the "Bind ring" that is in the Necro/SK
guild house, or is that a broken quest also?

I have a full suit of leather armor. I was just wondering what is the
proper order of increase that the armor should be? I think I have it as:

Leather
Banded
Chain
Bronze Plate
Plate

I have no clue if I am missing something. I need to get to the next level,
and don't think I can do it without getting better armor (which would be
banded if I am correct).

I have heard rumors about killing so many residents of Befallen that you
eventually can't get into our guild with out a KOS from the ghouls outside,
with out casting inv to undead. Is this true or false or don't know. I
consider the ghouls and they con warmly to me right now, not sure what that
means other than they aren't going to attack me right now.

Should I be hunting in Befallen ... alone? (I really don't care about the
above, as long as the npc inside don't attack me along with their pets).
And can I get armor their for free off the SK's in the back? Just a note I
hate rabies. And I guess does anyone know of an item (Jewelry) that would
protect me/us from disease, a 100% would be nice?

And that is about it for now. I am sure I will have more questions later...
if the list goes dead again :)

Tenin - Tarew Marr
